content: amigurumi pattern for magolor the interdimensional traveler from kirby s return to dreamland deluxe this is probably one of my favorite magolors he s pathetic and pitiful at the same time with me having the thoughts of yeah you deserve that but he is so cute when he cries or grieves a bit tilt the right stick in any direction or you can just stare at him for the next two minutes while he s not moving and see what happens for some reason i don t feel like giving you much guidance when it comes to the tattered cloak this is when you can let your creativity go wild like what i did cutting the cloak s hem and melting the ends with a lighter don t do this if you re using some organic material it will be consumed but even acrylic will ignite a bit or if you re planning for someone to use this as a toy instead of decorative use you can also get random with different kinds of stitches you use on the last row or just keep the neat look probably much safer materials worsted weight 4 medium in the following colors -light gray -gray felt in the following colors -white -yellow i used a crochet hook size f-3 75mm you ll also need some hot glue and fiber fill a tapestry needle comes in handy but a crochet hook works just as well abbreviations single_crochet= single_crochet st= stitch slip_stitch= slip_stitch increase= increase work two single_crochet into one st decrease= decrease chain= chain double_crochet= double_crochet double_crochet increase= increase using double_crochet work two double_crochet into one st blo= back loops only all phrases in parentheses are repeated until the end of the round/row tips -use scrap yarn as a stitch marker - the technique i use to join rounds is to chain 1 at the start of a round then close it with a slip_stitch i usually don t do this when i am crocheting several single_crochet entire round row this is where the scrap yarn stitch marker comes in handy marking where the previous row were procedure body gray 1 magic_ring single_crochet 6 slip_stitch together 2 increase entire round 3 single_crochet 1 increase 1 4 single_crochet 2 increase 1 5 single_crochet 3 increase 1 6 single_crochet 4 increase 1 7 single_crochet 5 increase 1 8-14 single_crochet next 7 rounds switch to light gray 15-19 single_crochet next 5 rounds switch to gray 20-23 single_crochet 4 rounds 24 single_crochet 5 decrease 5 25 single_crochet 4 decrease 5 26 single_crochet 3 decrease 5 27 single_crochet 2 decrease 5 28 single_crochet 1 decrease 5 slip_stitch together finish ears light gray or brown if it s the torn ear 1 magic_ring single_crochet 6 slip_stitch together 2 single_crochet entire round 3 single_crochet 1 increase 1 4 single_crochet entire round switch to gray 5 blo single_crochet 2 increase 1 6 blo single_crochet entire round 7 single_crochet 3 increase 1 8 single_crochet entire round slip_stitch finish with a longer tail than
